qas.question: Why were the gates foundation educational reforms critcized

answers.text: they may marginalize researchers who do not support Gates' predetermined policy preferences

qas.question: What are several of the gates backed policies

answers.text: Several Gates-backed policies such as small schools, charter schools, and increasing class sizes
but some studies indicate they have not improved educational outcomes and may have caused harm

qas.question: What does 1 specific study of charter schools show

answers.text: Peer reviewed scientific studies at Stanford find that Charter Schools do not systematically improve student performance
